name: Fruit Block Fit Logic!
description:
Fruit Block Fit Logic! is a challenging puzzle game with a simple gameplay. Let's try and feel it!
Place figures in order to create and clear full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally, get points and unlock achievements. The game continues until you can make moves, so don't forget to keep free space for new figures.
* Test your logic and train your skill in arcade fun brain games such as this one!
* Difficult brain exercises for you which will give you many challenging games!
* One of the best fruit games where you need to put every fruit slice and make a fruit garden in the center!
